content: the rocky shore hat is a beautiful beginner friendly pattern the subtle wave and raised ridges remind of waves hitting the rocks of a shore hence the name it works up beautifully in a dk weight wool and the sample was made with just over two skeins of knitpicks gloss dk simple and familiar stitches are combined to produce this stunning hat keeping your mind engaged happy crochet emma this is #12 in my year of hats check out my ravelry store or blog to see them all and follow me on social media so you don t miss any
